HammerHitDistanceComment: The distance in blocks that sound will travel. Vanilla default is 16.0
HammerHitVolumeComment: Maximum volume when the hammer strikes an anvil. Vanilla default is 1.0
HelveHitDistanceComment: The distance in blocks that sound will travel. Vanilla default is 32.0
HelveHitVolumeComment: Maximum volume when the hammer strikes an anvil. Vanilla default is 1.0
